mapper.update: update pro_modular set modularname = #{modularname} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select m.*, (select count(*) from pro_prototype where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as prototypenum, (select count(*) from pro_task where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as tasknum, (select count(*) from pro_test where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as testnum, (select count(*) from pro_bug where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as bugnum, (select count(*) from pro_design where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as designnum, (select count(*) from pro_file where modularid = m.id and groupstatus = 1) as filenum from pro_modular m where m.id = #{id}
